scifilehandler-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the SciFileHandler extension.
scifilehandler-special-hdfviewer-intro: Viewer for [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hierarchical_Data_Format Hierarchical Data Format] files, based on [https://github.com/silx-kit/h5web h5web]. You can link to Special:HdfViewer/.hdf to open a file directly.
scifilehandler-special-nmrviewer-intro: Viewer for NMR files, based on [https://github.com/cheminfo/nmrium NMRium]. You can link to Special:NmrViewer/.jdx to open a file directly.
scifilehandler-special-galvviewer-intro: Viewer for Biologic files, based on [https://github.com/zakodium-oss/galvanicium-app Galvanicium]. You can link to Special:GalvViewer/.mpr to open a file directly.
